Alert Name: bush
UAW: Chrysler pension to get boost
Union says Daimler, Cerberus to add $1.2 billion to funds; written commitment for no new job cuts unless market conditions are abnormal.
05/16/07 05:38 PM, EDT
The United Auto Workers union said Wednesday it had received a guarantee that the pension fund for Chrysler workers would get an additional $1.2 billion as a result of the pending sale of the struggling automaker.
